Meld into the shadows.
<font color='#ffd400'>[Primary Effects]</font> Enter stealth for <font color='#00aaef'>12</font> sec.
<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font> While hidden, movement speed increases by <font color='#00aaef'>43%</font>, spirit recovery increases by <font color='#00aaef'>2</font>, and your attacks stun targets for <font color='#00aaef'>1.5</font> sec. Using skills, items, or being hit by an enemy will cause you to exit stealth.

<font color='#ffd400'>[Bonus Effects]</font> Reduces target's movement speed by <font color='#00aaef'>32%</font> for <font color='#00aaef'>4</font> sec. This skill can be used to interrupt other skills.
